data.name: Halloween + Debut Costume Set
data.detailed_description:
NOTICE

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.


About the Game

One Halloween costume for each fighter (minus Alpha-152 and DOA5LR newcomers Raidou and Honoka), plus a 5-costume set for each of the newest DOA girls. Includes the following 51 costumes: ・31 Halloween 2014 Costumes ・5 Marie Rose Debut Costumes (Santa's Helper, School Uniform, Gym Class, Cheerleader, Nurse) ・5 Phase 4 Debut Costumes (Ultimate Sexy, Santa's Helper, Gym Class, Cheerleader, Nurse) ・5 Nyotengu Debut Costumes (Gym Class, Santa's Helper, Cheerleader, Nurse, Bathtime) ・5 Honoka Debut Costumes (Nurse, Cheerleader, Maid, Santa's Helper, Sexy Bunny) *You must have the latest update installed before using this content. ©2015 Valve Corporation. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.
data.about_the_game:
One Halloween costume for each fighter (minus Alpha-152 and DOA5LR newcomers Raidou and Honoka), plus a 5-costume set for each of the newest DOA girls.

Includes the following 51 costumes:

・31 Halloween 2014 Costumes
・5 Marie Rose Debut Costumes (Santa's Helper, School Uniform, Gym Class, Cheerleader, Nurse)
・5 Phase 4 Debut Costumes (Ultimate Sexy, Santa's Helper, Gym Class, Cheerleader, Nurse)
・5 Nyotengu Debut Costumes (Gym Class, Santa's Helper, Cheerleader, Nurse, Bathtime)
・5 Honoka Debut Costumes (Nurse, Cheerleader, Maid, Santa's Helper, Sexy Bunny)

*You must have the latest update installed before using this content.

©2015 Valve Corporation. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.
data.short_description: One Halloween costume for each fighter (minus Alpha-152 and DOA5LR newcomers Raidou and Honoka), plus a 5-costume set for each of the newest DOA girls. *You must have the latest update installed before using this content. ©2015 Valve Corporation.

fullgame.name: DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round: Core Fighters

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
  • Additional Notes: Online modes for Dead or Alive 5 Last Round will be added in a patch within 3 months of release.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
  • Additional Notes: Online modes for Dead or Alive 5 Last Round will be added in a patch within 3 months of release.
